description:
If use_ipv6 flag is true and network injection is active, there will be no inet6 section in /etc/network/interfaces.
Need pass use_ipv6 to interfaces.template as first level variable in libvirt_conn
title: Need pass use_ipv6 to interfaces.template as first level var in libvirt_conn

comments.content: Need pass use_ipv6 to interfaces.template in libvirt_con
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ilyaalekseyev

comments.content: This is a bit unclear, can't triage it, could you elaborate on what the bug is, rather than how you fix it ?
